summary: The document pertains to the JFK Assassination System, focusing on an investigation into incidents involving DOD-affiliated personnel. It describes an unsuccessful effort to find and interview Aleanso Ortiz, a character reference for Manuel Marti, a private in the US military, in the Bronx, New York. The search at the provided address yielded no records of Ortiz, and the building superintendent was unaware of Marti. The document, marked as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS', was last reviewed on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK Assassination System records.
It involves an investigation into DOD-affiliated personnel incidents.
The investigation focused on locating Aleanso Ortiz, a character reference for Manuel Marti.
No record of Ortiz was found at the specified address in the Bronx, NY.
The building superintendent had no knowledge of Marti.
The document is marked as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS' and was last reviewed on 03/07/95.
